data.name: ReadFips
data.value: select top(1) [STATE], COUNTY, LOCATION, STATE_ABBREVIATION from CKT_FIPS with(readuncommitted) where STATE_ABBREVIATION = 'KS'

data.name: ReadPgmNameTable
data.value: select top(1) PGM_NAME, PGM_DESCRIPTION from CKT_PGM_NAME_TABLE where PGM_NAME = cast(@name as char(8))
